subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The former pitcher Steve Howe had methamphetamine in his system when he was killed as his pickup truck drifted off a desert highway, a coroner's autopsy showed. Howe, 48, died of injuries sustained in the April 28 single-vehicle crash on Interstate 10 in Coachella, Calif., about 150 miles east of Los Angeles.
